author: matthiasksieber
title: Cloud Credits
description: Unlike other incubators/accelerators, Catalyst does not have partnerships with cloud providers to offer credits.
solution: Build partnerships with IBM, AWS, GCP, Microsoft Azure, Heroku, Digital Ocean to provide cloud credits for funded proposals.
experience: BA and Master's of Negotiation and Dispute Resolution; Cardano Foundation representative at Catalyst Circle; CEO Loxe Inc.
